attributes.action: Support business in providing group excersise, yoga or meditation opportunities in the work place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recently reported 'stress epidemic' and for the general wellbeing of the populus, I would like to see either partial or full government funding to encourage corporate run exercise schemes either before, or after work. Possible activities would be meditation, Tai Chi or simple stretching etc.
